title: 1dnorm
description: Normalize columns of a 1D file (AFNI ASCII list of numbers)

infile.title: Input file
infile.description: Input AFNI *.1D file (ASCII list of numbers arranged in columns); if '-' input will be read from stdin.

outfile.title: Output file
outfile.description: Output AFNI *.1D file (normalized); if '-' output will be written to stdout.

norm1.title: L_1 norm flag
norm1.description: Normalize so sum of absolute values is 1 (L_1 norm)

normx.title: L_infinity norm flag
normx.description: Normalize so that max absolute value is 1 (L_infinity norm)

demean.title: Demean flag
demean.description: Subtract each column's mean before normalizing

demed.title: Demedian flag
demed.description: Subtract each column's median before normalizing
